CustomField.formula: IF (Text(Satis_Rating__c)=='Very Satisfied', IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002PmCt", "VerySatisfied", 40, 40), IF ( Text(Satis_Rating__c)=='Satisfied', IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002PmCZ", "Satisfied", 40, 40), IF ( Text(Satis_Rating__c)=='Unsatisfied', IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002PmQ7", "Unsatisfied", 40 , 40), NULL)))
CustomField.label: Customer Satisfaction Rating
